com.hazelcast.internal.cluster.impl

Class MembershipManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.internal.cluster.impl.MembershipManager

  • public class MembershipManager
extends Object
    MembershipManager maintains member list and version, manages member update, suspicion and removal mechanisms. Also initiates and manages mastership claim process.
    Since:
    3.9
